name: TourDay
desc: Tourday is a platform where people can showcase their tours, share information & experiences.

name: Tic Tac Toe
desc: This is a Tic Tac Toe game Using minimax algorithm. This game playing two player one player is a Human and one player is a computer.

name: StudentDatabase
desc: Simple database website for Student. Easily store student information.

name: Dice-Game
desc: There are two dices here, The player looses his current score when one of them is a 1, After that, it's the next player's turn.

name: Motion-Primitive-Simulation
desc: The complete set of codes employed in my Bachelor's Thesis is available in this repository.

name: Autonomous-Driving
desc: Developed advanced Data recording processes for Inland Navigation with ROS2, integrating real-time Data collection, Python-driven optimization for Data quality, and Hardware-in-the-Loop testing featuring a GUI and MQTT/OPC UA protocols for the Project Mini-ELLA.

name: EnergyWise: Consumption and Cost Analyzer
desc: Implemented an OOP-based C++ application to calculate and analyze household energy consumption and costs, utilizing dynamic memory management, structured Data handling, and scalable multi-household features.

name: Funding Platform
desc: Comprehensive Project Funding platform prototype developed as part of a Software Engineering project, featuring end-to-end functionalities including funding requests, project discovery, secure donations, and lifecycle management using rigorous validation and domain-driven design principles.

name: Regression Analysis
desc: Developed two Regression Model functions to linearize complex equations and predict values and accuracy of both Models for various materials using Data-driven approaches

name: DataForge: Dynamic Query and Workflow Engine
desc: Designed and developed a high-performance Web Application leveraging optimized IBM DB2 Database Schemas, Automated Workflows, and dynamic query handling with JSPs and servlets.
